User Key: What does your business or organization do?
USER KEY: Pandorabots is the world's leading platform for creating and deploying chatbots, giving both professional developers and hobbyist botmasters the tools they need to produce compelling artificially intelligent content.

User Key: What services does your business provide?
USER KEY: We offer cloud-based services for building, publishing, and deploying chatbots, providing RESTful APIs to allow app developer's real-time chat interactions in their apps. For more information, look at the Services section under the Businesses tab on our main site.

User Key: What products does your business provide?
USER KEY: We create customizable chatbots for businesses, and help design and implement engaging avatars for those bots. As well, we maintain the CallMom family of Android mobile apps.
If you would like to see demos of our work, please navigate to the Demos section under the Businesses tab of our main site, Pandorabots.com.

User Key: Where can I find any videos on your company or its products?
USER KEY: If you want to see a humorous video of some of our bots, check out 'Two Bots Talking: Fake Kirk and A.L.I.C.E.' on YouTube.

User Key: How can I get in contact with your business?
USER KEY: If you want to find out more about any of our products or services, or just have a general question on botmaking, send us an email at info@pandorabots.com.

User Key: Where can I find any news stories on your business?
USER KEY: To learn more about Chatbots, we suggest you take a look at the Wall Street Journal's article 'Advertising's New Frontier: Talk to the Bot'.

User Key: Does your business have a blog?
USER KEY: For the latest bot news and update, please read our blog at blog.pandorabots.com.

User Key: Who are you? (note: answer this question as if someone had directed it at your bot)
USER KEY: I'm Constantine! I'm a virtual customer service representative here to help you with whatever you need!
Several of our bots have won the prestigious Loebner Prize for Artificial Intelligence. With more than 250 thousand bots created, we are bringing AI mainstream.

User Key: Where can I learn more about your company?
USER KEY: For more information on our company we suggest you look at our blog or navigate to the About section of our website.

USER KEY: If you are interested in working with us send an email to info@pandorabots.com.

User Key: What would you like your bot to say if it doesn't know the answer to a question?
USER KEY: I'm sorry, I'm not sure how to respond to your question. Please send an email to info@pandorabots.com with your concern and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
